text.section: This section does not apply to reserves for disability and accidental death benefits and benefits for long-term home health care and long-term care in a nursing home or other related institution included in a life insurance policy.

An insurer's aggregate reserves for all life insurance policies may not be less than the aggregate reserves calculated in accordance with:
the methods set forth in §§ 5-307, 5-308, 5-311, and 5-312 of this subtitle; and
the mortality tables and rates of interest used in calculating nonforfeiture benefits for those policies.
